1.18.0:
- Add "Sample test result checker" option

- Add "Show list of same topic" function, thanks to the contribution of **@wrk-123**

- Fix the problem that code block beautification didn't switch the topic correctly when the dark mode is "Follow system"

- Fix the problem of Arigatou Translation Error

- Fix the problem of waiting interval failure in "Segmented Translation" mode

- Fix the problem that exists when querying API balance. Thanks to the contribution of **@x1uc**

- Fix the problem of overlay class name conflict

- Improve the website localization rules, thanks to the contribution of **@nr0728**, **@user111192**, **@qjwh**.
1.17.0:
- **Replace the public repository CDN with [SUSTech Mirror](https://mirrors.sustech.edu.cn/help/cdnjs.html), see [issue](https://github.com/beijixiaohu/OJBetter/issues/151) for the reason.**



- Fix the issue that the "Expand/Collapse" button of submissions page code is invalid



- Adjust the layout structure of settings page.
1.16.1: - Fix a problem with website localization errors
